imdb.plot outline: Savor San Diego was created to highlight our vibrant food community in a thirty minute television program for KPBS. Host Su-Mei Yu, notable chef/owner of San Diego's Saffron restaurants and cookbook author brings the stories of our local bounty to viewers' television screens week after week. Each episode explores unique people, places and products in our food community and culminates with an easy-to-follow cooking demonstration by Su-Mei Yu.
imdb.title: Savor San Diego
plot: _Savor San Diego_ (qv) was created to highlight our vibrant food community in a thirty minute television program for KPBS. Host Su-Mei Yu, notable chef/owner of San Diego's Saffron restaurants and cookbook author brings the stories of our local bounty to viewers' television screens week after week. Each episode explores unique people, places and products in our food community and culminates with an easy-to-follow cooking demonstration by Su-Mei Yu.
